name: ZOKO
headline: Better Business on WhatsApp
description:
Zoko makes it easy for businesses, to do Sales, Marketing and Customer Support on WhatsApp. 

There are 100 million merchants worldwide, already using WhatsApp for their businesses. The founders started off with an ecommerce business, entirely on WhatsApp, which grew to a customer base of 200K followers who would make purchases after seeing their weekly WhatsApp updates. 

Other businesses started reaching out to them, offering to pay for their "WhatsApp sales tools". That was the Aha moment! The founders realized that selling these tools to other businesses, was the way to go. 

In fact, 175 million people message a business on WhatsApp everyday. Even Amazon can't beat that! There is a dire need for tools that allow businesses to use WhatsApp effectively as a channel to sell online. The market size for ecommerce on WhatsApp is estimated be north of $50B/year.

WhatsApp is the internet of the #nextbillion and Zoko plans to become the Shopify for merchants, selling on WhatsApp.

founders.name: Arjun Paul, Founder
founders.description: Arjun, on a mission to connect businesses to the #nextbillion via chat!

###### Better Business on WhatsApp
# Make WhatsApp your #1 revenue channel
Growing brands need smarter ways to target customers and drive repeat revenue on WhatsApp. Let Zoko turn your WhatsApp number into your #1 revenue channel.‍
[Start 7-Day Free Trial](https://www.zoko.io/<https:/app.live.zoko.io/login>)
## You'll be in good company.
Join the thousands of ecommerce merchants winning with WhatsApp
![Blaupunkt-Logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62c7d8a855813a593f39ae0c/62c7d8a855813af55b39b053_Blaupunkt.svg)![Happy-Jars-Logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62c7d8a855813a593f39ae0c/62c7d8a855813ae70739b055_Happy%20Jars.svg)![Super-Bottoms-Logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62c7d8a855813a593f39ae0c/62c7d8a855813a569c39b066_Super%20Bottoms.svg)![purple.com-logo-black](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62c7d8a855813a593f39ae0c/62c7d8a855813a3ec539b069_Purplle.svg)![Provócame-logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62c7d8a855813a593f39ae0c/62c7d8a855813a10a339b063_Provocame.svg)
###### WhatsApp Catalog
### Sell products right inside WhatsApp
Zoko's market-leading AI tools sync your website's catalog with WhatsApp and automatically sell products to customers right inside WhatsApp! 
###### WhatsApp Broadcasts
### WhatsApp broadcasts are 500% better than email!
WhatsApp has 500% better open rates than emails. Customers who message you on WhatsApp are your most engaged customers and prospects. Have personalized conversations with them at scale – with Zoko you can engage, qualify, and convert them in real time, day or night.
###### Drag and Drop Workflow Automation
### Doing it more than once? Automate it!
You wont find a better WhatsApp automation tool than FlowHippo. Build simple COD order confirmations or multi-step workflows that connect with Shopify and other apps like judge.me . FlowHippo gives you a canvas to automate any repetitive tasks, so you can focus on your making more revenue.
[Discover FlowHippo](https://www.zoko.io/<https:/www.flowhippo.com/>)
###### Still doing tickets?
### Still opening tickets? Customers expect support on WhatsApp
Today, customers expect instant, automated support from brands on WhatsApp! 93 of the top 100 Shopify Brands in "WhatsApp first" markets like India and Brazil offer support on WhatsApp. What are you waiting for?
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62c7d8a855813a593f39ae0c/67212cfec294a180fc8bf7fe_Meta%20Business%20Partner.png)
###### Official Meta Business Partner
### Trusted by Meta
We are experts in driving client success across the Meta technologies such as WhatsApp, Facebook, Instagram and more.
### Customers love the best in class performance of Zoko.
![Baba-E-Shop-logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62c7d8a855813a593f39ae0c/62c7d8a855813a910a39b074_5f32d5095ee6645cbed7809d_avatar-male-1%20copy.webp)
Baba E Shop
Gardening Store

![Green-Soul-Ergonomics-logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62c7d8a855813a593f39ae0c/62c7d8a855813ac60439b076_Template%20copy%204.webp)

One of the best WhatsApp Automation App. seamless integration with Shopify and works wonders. More than that, The ZOKO team is very friendly and supports promptly and effectively. Cheers to them for this awesome App and their team.
![Chemist-at-Play-logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62c7d8a855813a593f39ae0c/62c7d8a855813a843539b079_Template%20copy.webp)

Petfood Store
I stumbled upon Zoko quite randomly, and I've been really happy with their service! Starting with the demo and installation process - the team was super friendly, supportive and hands on. It made the whole process a lot less daunting and very easy. Post installation, the team gave the much needed support to ensure we were onboarded properly and this was really appreciated because not a lot apps do that! We have really enjoyed using the dashboard - super easy to use, we can also keep a track of the chats easily, and have more than one person using the chat! The thing that really impresses me is that the team are constantly innovating, coming up with new features. Anytime we have an issue, they are extremely responsive and their timeliness is commendable. 100% recommend Zoko.
![CuidaMiMascota-logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62c7d8a855813a593f39ae0c/62c7d8a855813a35a239b02b_Template%20copy%202.webp)

Pet Services
This app change our operations team world! We've wanted everything this app has for a lot of time, but could no find anything as easy to setup and with such a great support team like Zoko. We got verified in Whatsapp which is a big PRO, and in every step Zoko team was very supportive, obviously through whatsapp! Highly recommend!

generated_description:
**ZOKO: Empowering Businesses on WhatsApp**

Founded in 2021 and hailing from Bengaluru, India, Zoko is on a mission to revolutionize the way businesses engage with customers on WhatsApp. Picture this: 100 million merchants already leverage WhatsApp for business, and 175 million people message businesses on this platform every day—outpacing even giants like Amazon. Zoko steps in as a game-changer, providing essential sales, marketing, and customer support tools tailored specifically for WhatsApp. Their vision? To become the Shopify for merchants operating through this ubiquitous messaging app.

### Origins and Growth

Zoko's founders initially launched a successful e-commerce venture built entirely on WhatsApp, amassing a solid base of 200,000 followers who eagerly awaited weekly updates. This experience sparked the idea to create tools that other businesses could use—an "Aha!" moment that paved the way for Zoko’s inception. The opportunity was clear, given the projected market size of e-commerce on WhatsApp exceeding $50 billion annually.

### What ZOKO Offers

Zoko provides businesses with a comprehensive suite of features to turn WhatsApp into their primary revenue channel:

- **WhatsApp Catalog**: Synchronize and sell products directly within WhatsApp, making purchasing seamless for engaged customers.
  
- **Engaging Broadcasts**: With open rates 500% better than email, broadcast messages ensure your customers receive timely updates and can interact with your brand effortlessly.

- **FlowHippo Automation**: This intelligent automation tool allows brands to build custom workflows, managing everything from order confirmations to customer interactions without lifting a finger.

- **Customer Support**: Aligning with customer expectations for instant responses, Zoko enables merchants to offer real-time, automated support directly through WhatsApp, creating a user experience that’s both responsive and efficient.

### Community and Recognition

Being part of Y Combinator's W21 batch has positioned Zoko for strategic growth while establishing trust with clients through its partnership with Meta. They've received glowing reviews from their customers, citing exceptional support and a user-friendly interface that enhances their daily operations.

### Conclusion

ZOKO stands at the intersection of social messaging and e-commerce. With a dedicated team of 18 employees and a visionary outlook, they're set to reshape how businesses operate on WhatsApp, turning a messaging platform into a vibrant marketplace. If you’re looking to make WhatsApp your number one revenue channel, Zoko might just be the tool you need to harness this explosive potential.

To learn more, visit [Zoko's Website](https://www.zoko.io/).
